phrases: I do not know about tomorrow.
It is different than a sacrifice.
I do not think it is like some penalty game.
I do not get it at all.
I am a little bit unsatisfied, but your presence
right now is more than just important.
There is no such thing in this world
Crying is not painful, it is love's sweet drops, sweet drops!
I want to keep dreaming forever, ya know?
I want to be more kind, ya know?
As long as I Am with you, I Am happy.
Girls sure are strong, ya know?
But sometimes we are weak, ya know?
Our wish is to be happy, happy, happy!
And those days will be happy, too!
Just want to make you happy!
In fact, if I fall asleep now, I will not get this done.
Let us get a breath of fresh air.
You guys take a break too when you get a chance.
Call my cell if you need anything.
Well, if I turn off the AC, the boys mess up the manuscript with their sweat.
The body can cool down from stress, too...
About that new offer you were talking about the other day...
I do not think letting the quality of your current work drop
But Ma-chan, you do not really have a strong constitution or will.
And you are making a decent living as it is,
so there is no need to be greedy.
Right now, the spotlight's on me,
but who knows what will happen next year.
There will be younger artists coming out of the woodwork.
They could turn their back on me, just like that.
Ma-chan, you worry too much about what could go wrong.
You have an ink mark on your face again.
Ma-chan, you are a girl, so...
I am going home to work!
I am sorry for making a scene...
Pain in the ass to go to work...
Are you cooling off by doing that?
In the morning, we make her lunch together,
and then Rin goes to a day-care center.
How about we visit Grandpa's grave next Saturday?
You do not want to go?
After all, the bellflowers have not bloomed yet...
It looks like it will take a little more time.
Well, this time, we will buy flowers at a florist,
and we can go again when your flowers bloom.
You would make Grandpa happy bringing him the bellflowers that you grew.
But what would make Grandpa happiest is for you to visit.
If Rin were not here, I probably would not be thinking of Grandpa like this.
If you move, it screws the whole thing up!
Why is your hair so fine to begin with?
We are going to be late!
I have got a bunch of'them in here.
We are going to be late!
I have been here a lot of times before.
Grandma's laid to rest here too, come to think of it.
Um, Grandpa and Grandma's child is my mom.
Then that makes me your mother's sister...
I do not want her to go in this direction...
When she did not even come to his funeral!
Rin, I will be right back!
Pull up the weeds for me!
I mean, she goes with a man to visit the grave?!
I thought you were some deranged person...
I am supposed to be visiting a grave.
Accent on the supposed to be...
But I thought maybe I should let you know...
Um, look, Rin's dear to me, so to be honest, I do not often think about you.
I do not give a damn about your circumstances either.
Unless Rin wishes for it, I have no intention of ever getting you two together.
But you went out of your way to follow me, to say what?
Do you want to at least get a look at Rin secretly?
Now, we are going to clean the grave off, light incense and go home like normal.
I think it will take some time...
Well, Rin is waiting for me.
We are just going to go about our business.
Um... I had to do something...
She is no longer a baby...
Blood ties are an amazing thing.
She looks just like you, Ma-chan.
Maybe a coincidence like this happens because it is nearly O-Bon...
She is seven years old today...
I was surprised about your daughter, of course,
but I thought maybe he was your ex-boyfriend...
I do not think that man's got a lick of intelligence.
Although I cannot say what he would be like given another half a century...
I suppose that man was her boyfriend...
And far be it for me to say it is bad...
Well, she sure found herself a sweetheart fast enough...
Can we go to Grandpa's house?
It is near here, is not it?
But that is not Grandpa's house anymore.
No one's living there now, but the house is my uncle's...
My mom's older brother's house, so...
The family altar is there, too.
I will ask my uncle if we can just go in the yard.
I am going to try and do that assignment after all.
Are you sure about this, Ma-chan?!
I am alone for the sake of my work.
I have to do more work.
You work enough for two people!
I have to work so hard I forget what I had for dinner last night.
I always forget what I had for dinner the previous night...
If I do not forget many things...
It is the same as before, huh?
The bellflowers were precious to Grandpa!
I am sure he did not mean to remove them.
Uncle knows Grandpa's favorite flower at least.
But they wither up when winter comes...
Maybe he did not know that they put out buds again in the spring.
If you do not spread them all over like this,
weeds will spring up soon and become tough to deal with.
Thankfully, we moved Rin's fragrant olive.
But thankfully we have Grandpa's bellflowers at our house too, right?!
Because of that, they are still alive!
Maybe change is not all bad.
But that grave will always be Grandpa's grave, right?
Saionji-sensei, can you do the final check?
You really do seem to be in over your head this time...
When you put it into words like that, my hand stops working, so cut it out!
I will finish it, for sure.
It is the same road I am used to traveling
But I can see it sparkling so bright
With the sun shining down its warmth
And you here by my side...
I am already high, high, high
I am already high, high, high
Daikichi, the festival stalls are going to close!
We are supposed to meet up at the shrine, remember?
You are not wearing a yukata?
She said she will leave after her yukata is on, so we should meet at the shrine.
It is hard to run in geta!
